title: 《紅樓夢》Dream of the Red Chamber
author: 曹雪芹
description: 《紅樓夢》是一部描寫賈、史、王、薛四大家族榮枯興衰的長篇小說，以寶黛愛情悲劇為主線，展現了封建社會的種種弊端。Dream of the Red Chamber is a novel depicting the rise and fall of the four great families of Jia, Shi, Wang, and Xue. Centered around the tragic love story of Baoyu and Daiyu, it exposes various drawbacks of feudal society.
